title: 求1.3.2更多刷怪箱mod
author: 昊昊
txt_content: 如题,用网盘下载的就用百度网盘.

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
方法1.   http://dl.vmall.com/c0tsma1yfv
安装NEI即可从中调用

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
方法2.



Spawner_GUI_1.3.2.zip
(11.61 KB, 下载次数: 41)



2013-2-27 16:41 上传
点击文件名下载附件

replies.author: 昊昊
replies.txt_content:
strawmaine 发表于 2013-2-27 16:41 
方法2.
是放进minecraft.jar里呢,还是放进mods里?

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
昊昊 发表于 2013-2-27 21:40 
是放进minecraft.jar里呢,还是放进mods里?
mods里，前提是你的minecraft.jar安装了Forge或Modloader

replies.author: 昊昊
replies.txt_content:
strawmaine 发表于 2013-2-27 22:14 
mods里，前提是你的minecraft.jar安装了Forge或Modloader
咋用？？？？

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
昊昊 发表于 2013-2-27 22:28 
咋用？？？？
右击刷怪箱子，修改，ESC或E退出。
你至少也百度一下“Spawner GUI”再来问我啊小懒虫。。。
